title: Chapter 856 - How Could I Be So Fortunate?
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 856 - How Could I Be So Fortunate?

Aside from Ran Tianfeng, Tao Qianqiu was accompanied by seven Divine Peak Sword Court experts.

Two were Emperors, while the other five were Spirit Dao cultivators.

But when Su Yi’s slash reached the treasure ship, the five Spirit Dao cultivators didn’t even have time to dodge before the raging sword qi swept over them. Their bodies exploded, and their souls dispersed.

Although Tao Qianqiu and the other Emperors dodged, they cut sorry figures, and all of them looked unsightly.

“Is it even possible for a Spiritual Revolution cultivator to wield such power!?”

“Dammit!!”

Infuriated roars and startled cries resounded from within the cloud of dust.

Tao Qianqiu and his surviving companions’ faces were ashen, and all of them blazed with murderous intent.

Earlier, they’d completely disregarded Su Yi. Who’d have thought that this Spiritual Revolution Realm kid would catch them off guard with a single slash?

Even more unbelievably, that early-stage Profound Illumination Realm elder in red failed to block this strike. He survived, but it took his right arm off!

Now, Tao Qianqiu and company were fully aware that something was amiss.

“This…” Off in the distance, Cui Chang’an couldn’t help but gasp.

Last night, he’d...
original_title: Chapter 856 - How Could I Be So Fortunate?
